member.name: T:Aspera.Transfer.Environment
member.summary: This class contains configuration options for the fasp Manager.

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.Environment.getFaspScpPath
member.summary: Gets the path to the scp binary for fasp

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.Environment.getFaspVersion
member.summary: Gets the fasp version.
member.exception: ascp.exe not found

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.Environment.getPortFilePath
member.summary: Gets the path to the file where the fasp listening port is listed.

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.Environment.setFaspScpPath(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the path to the scp binary. Default: ascp.exe

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.Environment.setManagementPort(System.Int32)
member.summary: Set the port number at which fasp manager listens. It is best to not set this port. Fasp Manager will automatically pick an available port.

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.Environment.getManagementPort
member.summary: Get the Fasp Manager port
member.returns: the port at which Fasp Manager is listening

member.name: T:Aspera.Transfer.FaspManager
member.summary: This class is responsible for monitoring all fasp jobs and sessions running as clients (initiated locally) or servers (initiated remotely). The Manager reads all messages sent from ascp processes, and can provide information about the status and progress of jobs and sessions by notifying the fasp manager registered TransferListeners. A fasp manager listener may be added using the addListener(TransferListener) method.

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.FaspManager.getInstance
member.summary: Get a reference to FaspManager singleton object. Throws FaspManagerException if ascp.exe is not found.
member.returns: Pointer to singleton Fasp Manager object

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.FaspManager.isRunning
member.summary: Check if manager is currently running.
member.returns: True if fasp manager is running

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.FaspManager.start
member.summary: Start the fasp manager. This method creates a socket that listens for connections from ascp.
member.exception: thrown if ascp is not found or if unable to intialize fasp manager

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.FaspManager.getSessionIDList
member.summary: Get the list of IDs of all sessions in fasp manager.
member.returns: An ICollection of all session ids

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.FaspManager.getSessionStats(System.String)
member.summary: Get the statistics of a session by the jobId
member.exception: Thrown if no session found with the specified ID

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.FaspManager.addJobListener(System.String,Aspera.Transfer.FileTransferListener)
member.summary: Add a listener only for a particular job
member.exception: Thrown if no session found with the specified ID

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.FaspManager.removeJobListener(System.String,Aspera.Transfer.FileTransferListener)
member.summary: Remove a job listener
member.exception: Thrown if no session found with the specified ID

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.FaspManager.getSessionStatsByCookie(System.String)
member.summary: Get the statistics of a session identified by its cookie
member.exception: Thrown if no session found with the specified cookie

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.FaspManager.listenForServerSessions(System.Boolean)
member.summary: If set, fasp manager can manage transfers initiated outside fasp manager and any global listener will be notified of events on such transfers as well. Default: Off
member.param: 'true' to listen for server sessions, false to not listen

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.FaspManager.isListeningForServerSessions
member.summary: Check if the manager port is published (and thus management of external transfers is enabled)
member.returns: true if management of external transfers is enabled. Else false.

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.FaspManager.enableFaspDebug(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Turn on verbose mode for FASP logs. (aspera-scp-transfer.log)
member.param: True to turn on, False to turn off

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.FaspManager.getTraceSource
member.summary: Get the TraceSource object used by FaspManger for Tracing. Use this object to add TraceListeners to it and to control its Switch. Alternatively use App.Config to control tracing.

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.FaspManager.getReleaseVersion
member.summary: Get the release version of the fasp Manager.

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.FaspManager.destroy
member.summary: Destroy fasp manager. This method cancels any transfers in progress

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.FaspManager.removeTransferReference(System.String)
member.summary: Remove reference to a completed transfer session. Call this method to remove references to completed sessions after they are no longer needed
member.param: Id of the session to be removed
member.returns: Whether the session existed or not

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.FaspManager.cleanUpSessions
member.summary: Removes all jobs from hash tables. This will cancel any unfinished jobs. fasp Manger calls this method before it quits.

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.FaspManager.addListener(Aspera.Transfer.TransferListener)
member.summary: Add a new listener to the FaspManager singleton. This listener will be called for all events on all active session

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.FaspManager.removeListener(Aspera.Transfer.TransferListener)
member.summary: Remove a FaspManager listener
member.param: Object of the TrasnferListener class to be removed

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.FaspManager.startTransfer(Aspera.Transfer.JobOrder,Aspera.Transfer.FileTransferListener)
member.summary: Start a transfer and add a listener to that transfer job
member.param: Listener to be invoked on this transfer's events

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.FaspManager.startTransfer(Aspera.Transfer.JobOrder,System.Guid,System.Int32,Aspera.Transfer.FileTransferListener)
member.summary: Start a transfer and add a listener to that transfer job
member.param: Listener to be invoked on this transfer's events

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.FaspManager.startTransfer(Aspera.Transfer.JobOrder,System.Int32,Aspera.Transfer.FileTransferListener)
member.summary: Start a transfer and add a listener to that transfer job
member.param: The number of processes to launch for this transfer
Listener to be invoked on this transfer's events

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.FaspManager.startTransfer(Aspera.Transfer.JobOrder,System.Guid,System.Int32,System.Int32,Aspera.Transfer.FileTransferListener)
member.summary: Start a transfer and add a listener to that transfer job
member.param: The number of processes to launch for this transfer
Listener to be invoked on this transfer's events
member.exception: Cannot do multi process transfer with persistent session

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.FaspManager.setRate(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,Aspera.Transfer.Policy)
member.summary: Change the rates and policy of a transfer already in progress
member.exception: thrown if jobId not found or if the transfer is in a state where rates cannot be changed

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.FaspManager.cancelTransfer(System.String)
member.summary: Cancel an active transfer session. For non-persistent sessions, this operation will result in a SESSION_ERROR event.
member.exception: thrown if job id not found

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.FaspManager.stopTransfer(System.String)
member.summary: Stop an active persistent transfer session. All files being transferred are stopped immediately and no error is reported. Use cancelTransfer to terminate non-persistent sessions.
member.exception: thrown if job id not found

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.FaspManager.terminateTransfer(System.String)
member.summary: Terminate an active transfer session (persistent or regular). For regular sessions (non-persistent), this operation will result in a SESSION_ERROR event triggered to listeners. For persistent session, all files being transferred are stopped immediately and no error is reported.
member.exception: thrown if job id not found

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.FaspManager.lockPersistentSession(System.String)
member.summary: Once locked file paths can no more be added to a persistent session. A locked persistent session will terminate automatically when all currently added file paths are transferred.
member.exception: thrown if job id not found

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.FaspManager.addSource(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int64,System.Int64)
member.summary: Provide a source file path, corresponding destination path and the byte range to a persistent transfer session. To transfer a range of bytes it is required that source path be a file and not a directory.
member.param: the start of the byte range to be transferred. 0 is beginning of the file
the end of the byte range to be transferred. 0 indicates end of file
member.exception: thrown if job id not found or if the session is not persistent or if a path cannot be added in current session state

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.FaspManager.addSource(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Provide a source path and corresponding destination path to a persistent transfer session
member.exception: thrown if job id not found or if the session is not persistent or if a path cannot be added in current session state

member.name: P:Aspera.Transfer.FaspManager.AutoRemoveCompletedTransferReferences
member.summary: Setting this property to false will not remove transfers automatically from FaspManagers knowledge when they complete. For backwards compatability this is set to true by default

member.name: T:Aspera.Transfer.FileTransferListener
member.summary: The interface for implementing a fasp manager listener that get notified on file transfer events. A listener can either be subsrcibed as a global listener that gets notified on events of all transfer sessions or as a listener for a single transfer session using the methods addListener and addJobListener respectively.

member.name: T:Aspera.Transfer.TransferListener
member.summary: The parent classs for all TransferListeners

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.FileTransferListener.fileSessionEvent(Aspera.Transfer.TransferEvent,Aspera.Transfer.SessionStats,Aspera.Transfer.FileStats)
member.summary:
This is the method called when an event occurs. All event handling must be implemented in this method.
Note: It is required that the implementation of this method return quickly. Any time consuming tasks should be run on a different thread.
member.param: The event generated by the session
Session Level statistics of this transfer session
Statistics of the last transferred file in this transfer session

member.name: T:Aspera.Transfer.FaspManagerException
member.summary: A generic exception class for all Fasp Manager Exceptions. For further details look for the 'Message' and 'InnerException' fields on the actual instance of this class.

member.name: T:Aspera.Transfer.FileStats
member.summary: A FileStats object contains information about one file in a transfer session.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.FileStats.contiguousBytes
member.summary: The number of contiguous bytes of a file on the disk. Any other application that needs to consume the file being transferred need not wait for the transfer to complete. Instead it can consume the no. of bytes indicted by this field, from the beginning of the file.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.FileStats.errCode
member.summary: Error code (if state is FAILED).

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.FileStats.errDescription
member.summary: Error description (if state is FAILED).

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.FileStats.name
member.summary: The file name

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.FileStats.sizeBytes
member.summary: The file size

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.FileStats.state
member.summary: Transfer status

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.FileStats.writtenBytes
member.summary: Portion of the file at the destination (including resumed). Not necessarily contiguous.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.FileStats.startByte
member.summary: Starting offset in the file (either when a broken transfer is resumed or if only a range of bytes is requested) Non zero only if the transfer is a resume or if a range of bytes is requested.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.FileStats.endByte
member.summary: Offset in the file where the transfer is to end Non zero only if a range of bytes is requested.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.FileStats.fileChecksumType
member.summary: The file checksum type

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.FileStats.fileChecksum
member.summary: The file checksum

member.name: T:Aspera.Transfer.FileState
member.summary: These are the different states a file could be in.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.FileState.FAILED
member.summary: An error occurred while transferring this file.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.FileState.FINISHED
member.summary: The file transferred successfully.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.FileState.TRANSFERRING
member.summary: The file is currently transferring.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.FileState.SKIPPED
member.summary: The file is skipped during the transfer.

member.name: T:Aspera.Transfer.FileLocation
member.summary: Abstract parent for all location classes

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.FileLocation.getPaths
member.summary: Returns the paths at this source or destination location

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.FileLocation.addPath(System.String)
member.summary:
Add a file path to this source or destination. Destinations can take only one path.
If this method is called, then source/dest pairs will be disabled. Only sources will be used. To avoid this, always use add addPath(PathPair inPair) or addPath(String inSrc, String inDest)
member.param: the path of the file or directory to add

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.FileLocation.addPath(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a file or directory source/destination pair

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.FileLocation.clear
member.summary: Clears all paths added (for testing only)

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.FileLocation.buildCommand
member.summary: Create the temp file used for passing params to the command-line

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.FileLocation.createTempPairFile
member.summary: Create the temp file used for passing src/dest pairs to the command-line

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.FileLocation.getFirstPath
member.summary: Get the first path added

member.name: P:Aspera.Transfer.FileLocation.IsValidPairs
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this instance is valid pairs.
member.value: true if this instance is valid pairs; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Aspera.Transfer.FileLocation.TempFileName
member.summary: Gets the name of the temporary file.
member.value: The name of the temporary file.

member.name: T:Aspera.Transfer.FileTransferSession
member.summary: A FileTransferSession manages connection and file transfer between a source and a destination. The FileTransferSession is created when a FileTransferJob is created, and starts when the job starts.

member.name: T:Aspera.Transfer.Session
member.summary: An object of the Session class exists for every transfer that is in progress.

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.Session.handleAscpCrash
member.summary: Handles the ascp crash.

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.Session.setRate(System.Int32,System.Int32,Aspera.Transfer.Policy)
member.summary: Set the rate parameters for the transfer being handled by this session
member.param: Adaptive, Fixed or Trickle. To be specified using members of the enumeration 'Policy'

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.Session.addListener(Aspera.Transfer.TransferListener)
member.summary: Add a listener to the session
member.param: An object of the class(or its sub class) TransferListener

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.Session.removeListener(Aspera.Transfer.TransferListener)
member.summary: Removes a listener for the session
member.param: An object of the class(or its sub class) TransferListener

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.Session.close
member.summary: Closes this session.

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.Session.cancel
member.summary: Cancels this session.
member.exception: The channel has not been connected. It is too early to cancel the job.

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.Session.stop
member.summary: Stops this session.
member.exception: Transfer already completed. Cannot stop it anymore. or The channel has not been connected. It is too early to stop the job.

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.Session.terminate
member.summary: Terminates this session.
member.exception: Transfer already completed. Cannot terminate it anymore. or The channel has not been connected. It is too early to terminate the job.

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.Session.stopWhenIdle
member.summary: Stops the session when idle.
member.exception: Transfer already completed. Cannot stop it anymore. or The channel has not been connected. It is too early to stop the job.

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.Session.isFinished
member.summary: Tests if a job has failed or finished.
member.returns: True if Job has FAILED or FINISHED.

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.Session.getId
member.summary: Gets the identifier of the Job that created the session. Returns null if this transfer is initated by the remote)

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.Session.getXferId
member.summary: Gets the xfer Id for this transfer.

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.Session.getXferRetry
member.summary: Gets the xfer retry count for this transfer.

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.Session.getProcessIndex
member.summary: Gets the index of the process for this session.
member.returns: The index of the process for this session

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.Session.getNbProcesses
member.summary: Gets the nb of processes for this transfer.
member.returns: The nb of processes for this transfer

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.Session.getTotalTransferredBytes
member.summary: Gets the total bytes that has been transferred

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.Session.getSessionId
member.summary: Gets the session identifier.

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.Session.getCookie
member.summary: Gets the value of an arbitrary field used for application-specific requirements.

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.Session.getBandwidthCapKbps
member.summary: Gets the maximum bandwidth allowed

member.summary: Gets the error description (if the state is FAILED)

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.Session.getErrCode
member.summary: Gets the error code (if the state is FAILED)

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.Session.getHost
member.summary: Gets the address of the remote end point

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.Session.getMinumumRateKbps
member.summary: Gets the current minumum rate

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.Session.getPolicy

member.summary: Gets the start time of the session

member.summary: Gets the target rate in kbps

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.Session.getToken

member.summary: Gets the time that elapsed since the session started
member.returns: Total Elapsed Time in Milli Seconds

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.Session.getTotalLostBytes
member.summary: Gets the number of bytes lost in transfer.

member.summary: Gets the total bytes transferred to the destination (including resumed)

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.Session.getUser
member.summary: Gets the user name used in authentication.

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.Session.getUdpPort
member.summary: Gets the UDP port used by Fasp for transferring the data

member.summary: Is this session on the remote side (other side initiated transfer)

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.Session.isUpload

member.summary: Sets the cookie for the session

member.summary: Sets the user string.

member.summary: Adds the source.
member.exception: Cannot add source path to a non persistent session or Transfer already completed. Cannot add path. or The channel has not been connected. It is too early to add source path to the job.

member.summary: Makes the session persistent or not.

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.FileTransferSession.EscapeArguments(System.String[])
member.summary:
Shamelessly lifted from: http://csharptest.net/529/how-to-correctly-escape-command-line-arguments-in-c/
Quotes all arguments that contain whitespace, or begin with a quote and returns a single argument string for use with Process.Start().
member.param: A list of strings for arguments, may not contain null, '\0', '\r', or '\n'
member.returns: The combined list of escaped/quoted strings
member.exception: Raised when one of the arguments is null
Raised if an argument contains '\0', '\r', or '\n'

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.FileTransferSession.getCurrentFile
member.summary: Gets the name of the current file. If the session transfers multiple files, this field will contain the name of the file in the latest STAT message.

member.summary: Handles the ascp crash.

member.summary: Gets information about the current file being transferred. If the session transfers multiple files, this field will contain information about the file in the latest STAT message.
member.returns: Statistics of the last transferred file. null if file statistics not available

member.summary: Returns the source path

member.summary: Returns the destination path

member.summary: Gets the session stats.

member.summary: A JobOrder contains all the parameters required to initated an Aspera transfer i.e. the source, the destination, and the transfer parameters.

member.summary: Creates a JobOrder given the source, destination, and transfer parameters.

The destination location (local for downloads; remote for uploads)
member.exception: thrown if the job order parameters fail validation

member.summary: Gets the source.

member.summary: Gets the destination.

member.summary: Gets the xfer parameters.

member.summary: Determines whether this instance is upload.

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.JobOrder.validate
member.summary: Checks the order for invalid parameters. If validation fails, use the getValidationError() method to retrieve the error message.
member.returns: False if a problem is found, true otherwise.

member.name: T:Aspera.Transfer.LocalFileLocation
member.summary: This object represents the paths to files in the host computer, where the fasp Manager is running. For uploading, use the FilePaths.add method to add each source file or directory. For downloading, use the same method to set the path of the destination directory.

member.name: T:Aspera.Transfer.RemoteFileLocation
member.summary: This object represents the location of files or directories on the remote computer. For uploading, set the destination directory using the FilePaths.add method. For downloading, use the same method to add each source file or directory.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.RemoteFileLocation.host
member.summary: The remote address. Null if this is a local location.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.RemoteFileLocation.identity
member.summary: The path to the identity file (private key) for use in public key authentication.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.RemoteFileLocation.password
member.summary: The login password or the passphrase associated with the identiy file (private key).

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.RemoteFileLocation.user
member.summary: The login user name.

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.RemoteFileLocation.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Create a remote file location that uses password authentication
member.exception: Raised when one of the arguments is null or empty

member.summary: Create a remote file location that uses SSH public key authentication.
member.param: The path to local file containing the SSH identify (private key)
The passphrase used to secure the private key (if needed)
member.exception: Raised when one of the arguments is null or empty

member.summary: The bandwidth cap enforced on this transfer

member.summary: Cookie

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.SessionStats.Host
member.summary: The remote host

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.SessionStats.StartTime
member.summary: Time this transfer started

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.SessionStats.TotalLostBytes
member.summary: Number of bytes lost during this transfer

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.SessionStats.TotalTransferredBytes
member.summary: Total number of bytes written at the destination If this is a resumed transfer, this field does NOT include bytes transferred during previous sessions.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.SessionStats.Token
member.summary: Token

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.SessionStats.User
member.summary: User name used to connect to remote host

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.SessionStats.MeasuredLinkRateKbps
member.summary: Measured bandwidth, if automatic bandwidth detection is turned on

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.SessionStats.PreCalcTotalBytes
member.summary: Size of all files in the session; calculated before starting the transfer

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.SessionStats.PreCalcTotalFiles
member.summary: Size of all files in the session; calculated before starting the transfer

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.SessionStats.Direction
member.summary: The direction of transfer (upload or download)

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.SessionStats.Remote
member.summary: True if this transfer session is initiated by a remote host

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.SessionStats.OtherInitiated
member.summary: True if this transfer session is not initiated by this instance of fasp manager (Could be initiated either by a remote host or by another local component)

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.SessionStats.DelayMs
member.summary: Network delay

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.SessionStats.ElapsedUSec
member.summary: Elapsed micro seconds since the beginning of this transfer

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.SessionStats.ManifestFilePath
member.summary: Path to the manifest file, if generated. Available only at the end of Session (either failure or completion)

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.SessionStats.TransfersAttempted
member.summary: The count of file transfers initiated.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.SessionStats.TransfersFailed
member.summary: The count of file transfers with errors.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.SessionStats.TransfersPassed
member.summary: The count of file transfers successfully completed.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.SessionStats.TransfersSkipped
member.summary: The count of file transfers skipped (i.e. file already at the destination, overwrite policy violation, ...).

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.SessionStats.SourcePathsScanAttempted
member.summary: PathScansAttempted: Source paths attempted.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.SessionStats.SourcePathsScanFailed
member.summary: PathScansFailed: Source paths failed.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.SessionStats.SourcePathsScanIrregular
member.summary: PathScansIrregular: Source paths pointing to irregular files (i.e. char/block devices).

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.SessionStats.SourcePathsScanExcluded
member.summary: PathScansExcluded: Source paths excluded due to matching exclude arguments.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.SessionStats.Tags
member.summary: Metatags in json format specified by --tags

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.SessionStats.Pmtu
member.summary: The Path MTU.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.SessionStats.TcpPort
member.summary: The FASP TCP port for authentication.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.SessionStats.ServerNodeId
member.summary: The Server Node ID.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.SessionStats.ClientNodeId
member.summary: The Client Node ID.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.SessionStats.ServerClusterId
member.summary: The Server Cluster ID.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.SessionStats.ClientClusterId
member.summary: The Client Cluster ID.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.SessionStats.RetryTimeout
member.summary: The informative retry timeout.

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.SessionStats.Clone
member.summary: Clones this instance.

member.name: T:Aspera.Transfer.SessionState
member.summary: This enumeration contains various states a Session could be in.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.SessionState.SUBMITTED
member.summary: Transfer has been submitted to fasp manager

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.SessionState.AUTHENTICATING
member.summary: Attempting to authenticate with the remote endpoint.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.SessionState.CONNECTING
member.summary: Attempting to establish a connection with the remote endpoint.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.SessionState.FAILED
member.summary: An error occurred that prevented the Session from completing.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.SessionState.FINISHED
member.summary: The Session completed successfully.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.SessionState.STARTED
member.summary: A connection was established and the session has started.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.SessionState.TRANSFERRING
member.summary: The Session is currently in progress.

member.name: T:Aspera.Transfer.TransferEvent
member.summary: These are the different events that a transfer session may trigger.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.TransferEvent.FILE_ERROR
member.summary: Error in transferring the file.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.TransferEvent.FILE_START
member.summary: File transfer started.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.TransferEvent.FILE_STOP
member.summary: File transfer stopped.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.TransferEvent.FILE_SKIP
member.summary: File skipped event.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.TransferEvent.RATE_MODIFICATION
member.summary: Session transfer rate was modified.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.TransferEvent.SESSION_ERROR
member.summary: Error in the session.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.TransferEvent.SESSION_START
member.summary: Session starts.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.TransferEvent.SESSION_STOP
member.summary: Session ends.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.TransferEvent.PROGRESS
member.summary: Transfer is in progress

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.TransferEvent.CONNECTING
member.summary: The session is trying to establish a connection.

member.name: T:Aspera.Transfer.XferParams
member.summary: A structure of transfer parameters (for example encryption, transfer rates, etc) needed to start a fasp Job.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.XferParams.autoDetectCapacity
member.summary: Automatically detect bandwidth capacity. Default: false This feature is known to be unreliable for connections faster than 10Mbps. You are discouraged from using this feature.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.XferParams.cookie
member.summary: An arbitrary field used for application-specific requirements. Default: null

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.XferParams.createDirs
member.summary: Create target directory if it doesn't already exist. Default: false

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.XferParams.datagramSize
member.summary: Specify the datagram size (MTU) for fasp to use. Otherwise fasp will automatically use the detected path MTU. Default: 0 (use detected)

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.XferParams.encryption
member.summary: Specify the encryption cipher to use. Encryption is turned off by default. Set this to true to encrypt the transfer using AES-128 cipher.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.XferParams.cipher
member.summary: Specify the encryption cipher to use. If both this option and the 'encryption' options are set, the 'cipher' option will prevail. If 'cipher' is null, 'encryption' option will be used to ensure backwards compatibility. Default: null

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.XferParams.localLogDir
member.summary: Specify a directory to write the log file in for the local host, instead of using the default directory. Default: null

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.XferParams.minimumRateKbps
member.summary: The minimum transfer rate in kbps. This value is interpreted as a percentage of detected bandwidth when autoDetectCapacity is true. Default: 0

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.XferParams.policy
member.summary: Transfer rate policy. Default: FAIR

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.XferParams.preserveDates
member.summary: Preserve file date attributes. Default: false

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.XferParams.remoteLogDir
member.summary: Specify a directory to write the log file in for the local host, instead of using the default directory. Default: null

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.XferParams.retryTimeoutS
member.summary: Informs any monitoring applications how long you intend to retry. Note that the fasp manager itself does not implement retry; you must do this. Default: 0 (no retry)

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.XferParams.symLinkPolicy
member.summary: How symbolic links are handled.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.XferParams.resumeCheck
member.summary: Resume policy for partially transferred files.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.XferParams.sourceBase
member.summary:
Specify the prefix to be stripped off from each source object. The remaining portion of the source path is kept intact at the destination.
If the target directory does not exist, this option must be used along with 'XferParams.createDirs'.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.XferParams.targetRateKbps
member.summary: The target transfer rate in kbps. This value is interpreted as a percentage of detected bandwidth when autoDetectCapacity is true. Default: 10000 (100 when autoDetectCapacity is turned on)

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.XferParams.tcpPort
member.summary: The TCP port used for transfer initialization. Default: 22

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.XferParams.token
member.summary: Security token. Default: null

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.XferParams.udpPort
member.summary: The UDP port used for transferring data. Default: 33001

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.XferParams.contentProtectionPassphrase
member.summary:
Content protection passphrase. Specifying a passphrase turns on content protection i.e. uploaded files are left encrypted on the destination and downloads are decrypted as they as downloaded.
Default: null, contentProtection not used

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.XferParams.preCalculateJobSize
member.summary: Before starting the transfer, calculate and report the aggregate size of all files in the session. For large file sets, this option can introduce a significant delay. Use caution ! Default: false

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.XferParams.fileManifestFormat
member.summary: Set this to a value other than 'NONE' to enable file manifests

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.XferParams.fileManifestPath
member.summary: Path to a directory on the client machine where the manifest file is to be written. If the path is invalid the manifest file will not be generated.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.XferParams.deleteSource
member.summary: Delete source files after successful transfer Default: OFF

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.XferParams.removeFileAfterTransfer
member.summary: Remove source files after transferring. Default: false

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.XferParams.removeEmptyDirectories
member.summary: Remove source empty directories after transferring. Default: false

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.XferParams.skipSpecialFiles
member.summary: Skip special files. Default: {false}

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.XferParams.preserveFileOwnerUID
member.summary: Preserve file owner UID. Default: false

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.XferParams.preserveFileOwnerGID
member.summary: Preserve file owner GID. Default: false

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.XferParams.persist
member.summary: When set to true the transfer is launched in persistent mode. In persistent mode source and destination paths cannot be specified on Location objects. Instead source and destination paths are added once the transfer session is established. Default: false

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.XferParams.overwritePolicy
member.summary: Overwrite behavior when a file being transferred already exists at the destination.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.XferParams.readSize
member.summary:
Read block size in bytes.
Must be a positive number, negative numbers will be ignored.
0 to use ascp default

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.XferParams.writeSize
member.summary:
Write block size in bytes.
Must be a positive number, negative numbers will be ignored.
0 to use ascp default

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.XferParams.tags
member.summary: The tags MUST be well-formed JSON.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.XferParams.prePostCommand
member.summary: Pre and Post command file path.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.XferParams.alternateConfigFile
member.summary: Alternate Configuration file name

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.XferParams.partialFileSuffix
member.summary: Default SUFFIX is ".partial"

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.XferParams.excludeNewerThan
member.summary: Exclude files newer than "mtime". Exclude files from the transfer based on when the file was last changed. Positive MTIME values are compared directly to the "mtime" timestamp in the source file system, usually seconds since 1970-01-01 00:00:00. Negative MTIME values are taken as specifying a file "mtime" value equal to the present + MTIME. Some file servers use a different mtime reference point, and then only positive MTIME argument values relative to that reference will work sensibly.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.XferParams.excludeOlderThan
member.summary: Exclude files older than "mtime". Exclude files from the transfer based on when the file was last changed. Positive MTIME values are compared directly to the "mtime" timestamp in the source file system, usually seconds since 1970-01-01 00:00:00. Negative MTIME values are taken as specifying a file "mtime" value equal to the present + MTIME. Some file servers use a different mtime reference point, and then only positive MTIME argument values relative to that reference will work sensibly.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.XferParams.saveBeforeOverwriteEnabled
member.summary: If a transfer would result in an existing file <filename>.<ext> being overwritten, move that file to <filename>.yyyy.mm.dd.hh.mm.ss.index.<ext> (where index is set to 1 at the beginning of each new second and incremented for each file saved in this manner during the same second) in the same directory before writing the new file. File attributes are maintained in the renamed file.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.XferParams.sourceRoot
member.summary:
Specify the root path of the transfers. This path will be prepended to each source path in the transfer.
If this option is used, implementers must make sure that all specified source paths are relative to this defined source root path. Available since ascp version 3.5.5

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.XferParams.checkSshFingerprint
member.summary: Check it against server SSH host key fingerprint (e.g., f74e5de9ed0d62feaf0616ed1e851133c42a0082).

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.XferParams.ignoreSshFingerprint
member.summary: Ignore server SSH host key fingerprint when initiating the transfer session. Default: false Available since ascp version 3.5

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.XferParams.applyLocalDocroot
member.summary: Apply a local docroot for the local paths. Default: false Available since ascp version 3.5.5

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.XferParams.multiSessionThreshold
member.summary: This value, if set to a value greater than 0, is used to skip multi-session if file size is less than this threshold Available since ascp version 3.6.0

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.XferParams.removeEmptySourceDirectory
member.summary: Remove the source directory itself if empty. Note that this option is better used with removeEmptyDirectories enabled. Default: false Available since ascp version 3.6.0

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.XferParams.deleteBeforeTransfer
member.summary: Delete all extraneous files from the destination folder before any file is transferred. Default: false Available since ascp version 3.6.0

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.XferParams.retransmissionRequestMaxSize
member.summary: Adjust the maximum size in bytes of a retransmission request (max 1440).

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.XferParams.excludePatterns
member.summary: List of patterns (maximum 16) used to exclude files from transferring. Two special symbols are accepted as part of a pattern: * to match any character zero or more times, and ? to match any character exactly once.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.XferParams.httpFallback
member.summary: The HTTP fallback.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.XferParams.moveAfterTransferPath
member.summary: Move transferred files to this location after transfer success

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.XferParams.destinationRoot
member.summary:
Specify the destination root directory of the transfers.
Note: This will override any paths added to the destination location object.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.XferParams.preserveAccessTime
member.summary: Preserve access time. Default: false Available since ascp version 3.5.5

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.XferParams.preserveModificationTime
member.summary: Preserve modification time. Default: false Available since ascp version 3.5.5

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.XferParams.preserveSourceAccessTime
member.summary: Preserve source access time. Default: false Available since ascp version 3.5.5

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.XferParams.preserveCreationTime
member.summary: Preserve creation time. Default: false Available since ascp version 3.5.5

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.XferParams.skipDuplicateCheck
member.summary: Do not check for duplicate files in the directory scan. Default: false Available since ascp version 3.6.0

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.XferParams.aclOption
member.summary: Specify ACLs preservation modes (local). Default: false Available since ascp version 3.6.0

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.XferParams.remoteAclOption
member.summary: Specify ACLs preservation modes (remote). Default: false Available since ascp version 3.6.0

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.XferParams.extendedAttributesOption
member.summary: Specify Extended Attributes preservation modes (local). Default: false Available since ascp version 3.6.0

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.XferParams.remoteExtendedAttributesOption
member.summary: Specify Extended Attributes preservation modes (remote). Default: false Available since ascp version 3.6.0

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.XferParams.reportSkippedFiles
member.summary:
Include skipped files in the transfer information report. By default, ascp does not report notification when a file is skipped. Set to {true} to get report about skipped files.
Default: {false} Available since ascp version 3.6.1

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.XferParams.fileChecksum
member.summary:
Controls whether or not checksum of each file is reported and what type of checksum is reported.
Default: {none} Available since ascp version 3.5.2

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.XferParams.appendToAsperaTags
member.summary:
Function to be overloaded by other Aspera products in order to extend the "aspera" tags with Aspera-specific values.
Appends to aspera tags.
member.returns: a Json Object containing the json key/value pairs to be appended to the "aspera" object

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.XferParams.getExtendedOptions
member.summary:
Function to be overloaded by implementors to extend the built-in Aspera command options with options and their values supported by the underlying ascp command.
Appends to ascp command options list.

member.name: T:Aspera.Transfer.Resume
member.summary: These are the resume options for transferred files, if a file is found with the same name at the destination.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.Resume.FILE_ATTRIBUTES
member.summary: If the size of the source and destination match, resume the transfer.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.Resume.FULL_CHECKSUM
member.summary: If the full checksum of the source and destination match, resume the transfer.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.Resume.OFF
member.summary: Always re-transfer.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.Resume.SPARSE_CHECKSUM
member.summary: If the sparse checksum of the source and destination match, resume the transfer.

member.name: T:Aspera.Transfer.SymLinkPolicy
member.summary: The Symbolic Link Policy

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.SymLinkPolicy.COPY
member.summary: Copy the symbolic link itself to the destination.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.SymLinkPolicy.FOLLOW
member.summary: Follow the symbolic link and copy the file.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.SymLinkPolicy.COPY_FORCE
member.summary: Forcibly copy the symbolic link itself.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.SymLinkPolicy.SKIP
member.summary: Skip the symbolic link.

member.name: T:Aspera.Transfer.Policy
member.summary: These are the rate policy options for a fasp transfer.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.Policy.FAIR
member.summary: Transfer at the target rate while slowing down to allow other traffic. Default value.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.Policy.FIXED
member.summary: Transfer at the target rate regardless of other network traffic.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.Policy.HIGH
member.summary: Transfer at the target rate while slowing down to allow other traffic. Take higher priority over FAIR.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.Policy.LOW
member.summary: Use only unused network bandwidth.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.FileChecksum.SHA1
member.summary: Report the checksum as sha1.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.FileChecksum.MD5
member.summary: Report the checksum as md5.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.FileChecksum.NONE
member.summary: Don't report the checksum.

member.name: T:Aspera.Transfer.FileManifestFormat
member.summary: The File Manifest Format

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.FileManifestFormat.NONE
member.summary: Disable generation of manifest file

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.FileManifestFormat.TEXT
member.summary: Generate a plain text manifest file

member.name: T:Aspera.Transfer.DeleteSource
member.summary: DeleteSource enum.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.DeleteSource.NONE
member.summary: Disable source deletion

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.DeleteSource.FILES_ONLY
member.summary: Delete source files after successful transfer but not directories

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.DeleteSource.FILES_AND_DIRECTORIES
member.summary: Delete source files as well as directories after sucessful transfer

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.DeleteSource.EMPTY_DIRECTORIES
member.summary: Delete empty directorie after sucessful transfer

member.name: T:Aspera.Transfer.OverwritePolicy
member.summary: The Overwrite Policy.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.OverwritePolicy.DIFFERENT
member.summary: Overwrite only if the existing file is different, Default value.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.OverwritePolicy.ALWAYS
member.summary: Always overwrite the existing file

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.OverwritePolicy.DIFFERENT_AND_OLDER
member.summary: Overwrite only if the existing file is different and also older

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.OverwritePolicy.NEVER
member.summary: Never overwrite an existing file

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.OverwritePolicy.OLDER
member.summary: Overwrite only if the existing file is older

member.name: T:Aspera.Transfer.AclOption
member.summary: Acl (acls) options preservation

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.AclOption.NONE
member.summary: Do not preserve acl.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.AclOption.NATIVE
member.summary: acls are preserved using native capabilities of the file system. But this storage mode is not supported on all file systems.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.AclOption.METAFILE
member.summary: acls for a file (say, "readme.txt") are preserved in a second file, whose name is composed of the name of the (primary) file with ".aspera-meta" appended (i.e., "readme.txt.aspera-meta"). The aspera-meta files are platform-independent and can be copied between hosts without loss of information. This storage mode is supported on all file systems.

member.name: T:Aspera.Transfer.ExtendedAttributesOption
member.summary: Extended attribute (xattrs) options preservation

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.ExtendedAttributesOption.NONE
member.summary: Do not preserve extended attributes.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.ExtendedAttributesOption.NATIVE
member.summary: extended attributes are preserved using native capabilities of the file system. But this storage mode is not supported on all file systems.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.ExtendedAttributesOption.METAFILE
member.summary: extended attributes for a file (say, "readme.txt") are preserved in a second file, whose name is composed of the name of the (primary) file with ".aspera-meta" appended (i.e., "readme.txt.aspera-meta"). The aspera-meta files are platform-independent and can be copied between hosts without loss of information. This storage mode is supported on all file systems.

member.name: T:Aspera.Transfer.Cipher
member.summary: Transfer cipher methods.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.Cipher.NONE
member.summary: Do not encrypt.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.Cipher.AES_128
member.summary: Use AES-128.

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.Cipher.AES_192
member.summary: Use AES-192

member.name: F:Aspera.Transfer.Cipher.AES_256
member.summary: Use AES-256

member.name: T:Aspera.Transfer.HTTPFallback
member.summary: HTTP fallback.

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.HTTPFallback.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. Default constructor.

member.name: M:Aspera.Transfer.HTTPFallback.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Boolean,System.String,System.String,System.Net.EndPoint)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: If set to true encode all as JPE.
member.exception: Thrown when key file or certificate file does not exist.
